Create_New_Transition_Annot_Button_Click
Private Sub Create_New_Transition_Annot_Button_Click()
Description

Function that controls what happens when the when the following button is left clicked

Public Property whatsclicked = "Create_New_Transition_Annot_Button" Load_Transition_Name_Tidy Box will be hidden

Browse_Tidy_Data_Click
Private Sub Browse_Tidy_Data_Click()
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following button is left clicked

Users will be asked to choose the input file in tabular form.  Once done, the Create new Transition Annotation button will be enabled.

Tidy_Data_File_Path_KeyUp
Private Sub Tidy_Data_File_Path_KeyUp(ByVal KeyCode As MSForms.ReturnInteger, ByVal Shift As Integer)
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following text box is edited

The text box will be cleared to prevent an invalid file path.  The Create new Transition Annotation button will be disabled.

Starting_Row_Number_TextBox_Exit
Private Sub Starting_Row_Number_TextBox_Exit(ByVal Cancel As MSForms.ReturnBoolean)
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following text box is exited

The system will check if the input is valid. Invalid inputs will be given this message box error.

Starting_Column_Number_TextBox_Exit
Private Sub Starting_Column_Number_TextBox_Exit(ByVal Cancel As MSForms.ReturnBoolean)
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following text box is exited

The system will check if the input is valid. Invalid inputs will be given this message box error.

Transition_Name_Property_ComboBox_Change
Private Sub Transition_Name_Property_ComboBox_Change()
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following combo box is changed

If Read as column variables is chosen, the starting row number will be set to 1 while the starting column number will be set to 2

If Read as row observations is chosen, the starting row number will be set to 2 while the starting column number will be set to 1

Form Initialisation
Load_Transition_Name_Tidy form initialisation
Private Sub UserForm_Initialize()
Description

Function that controls what happens when the Load_Transition_Name_Tidy form is initialize when user click on the button "Load Transition_Name from Table Data" in the Transition_Name_Annot sheet

The function will create the Data_File_Type combo box.  Currently, only "csv" is added in the dropdown and hence it is also the default value

It also create the Transition_Name_Property combo box by adding entries "Read as column variables" and "Read as row observations". "Read as column variables" is the default

Next, it will set the Starting_Row_Number text box value as 1 and Starting_Row_Number text box as 2
